name: unsophistication
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being unsophisticated (= not complicated, or not having a good understanding of the way people behave, or a good knowledge of culture and fashion) : He invented the persona partly to mask his lack of education and his youthful unsophistication. Sweet foods are often associated with unsophistication, lack of self-control, and obesity.
More examplesFewer examplesTheir latest album shows them fusing sophistication and unsophistication in equal measure.With his crude haircut and his badly-fitting clothes, he is the picture of unsophistication.
